text: Also requests the Secretary-General to submit to the General Assembly at its eighty-second session a progress report, within existing resources, on the implementation, effectiveness and added value of smooth transition measures covering both graduating and recently graduated countries, including new and dedicated support measures to graduated countries in moving forward on their development path and initiatives taken by the United Nations system to support countries during their graduation from the least developed country category, under the sub-item entitled “Follow-up to the Fifth United Nations Conference on the Least Developed Countries” of the item entitled “Groups of countries in special situations”.
